arts.ttl: Champions League Preview: Napoli vs Sporting CP – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction
arts.sum: Napoli will be looking to bounce back from Sunday’s slump at San Siro when they take on Sporting CP in the Champions League tonight. Antonio Conte’s charges return to Stadio Diego Armando Maradona wounded after losing at Milan last weekend.
